BaselinePropagationMode.title: Baseline Propagation Mode
BaselinePropagationMode.description: Baseline propagation determines whether changes made to your baseline will automatically propagate to your downstream tenants with your approval. This setting determines the enablement of baseline propagation.

DisableErrorReporting.title: Disable Error Reporting
DisableErrorReporting.description: This disables automated alerts for when your Sync fails. You can disable this if you don't want your error data sent to CoreView's support ticketing system.

M365ManagementToolVersion.title: Sync Version
M365ManagementToolVersion.description: The Sync version that your tenants are running on.
M365ManagementToolVersion.default: Changing this may break your Sync pipeline.

EventHubAppId.title: Event Hub App Id
EventHubAppId.description: App ID for the app registration with access to the event hub.

EventHubAppSecret.title: Event Hub App Secret
EventHubAppSecret.description: Client secret for the app registration with access to the event hub.

EventHubSkipUnchanged.title: Event Hub Skip Unchanged
EventHubSkipUnchanged.description: Option to only send changed data to event hub.

EventHubEndpointUrl.title: Event Hub Endpoint Url
EventHubEndpointUrl.description: Full URL for the event hub namespace including the queue.

EventHubTenant.title: Event Hub Tenant
EventHubTenant.description: The tenant in which the event hub is installed.

LogAnalyticsAppId.title: Log Analytics App Id
LogAnalyticsAppId.description: App ID for the app registration with access to the log analytics workspace.
LogAnalyticsAppId.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsAppSecret.title: Log Analytics App Secret
LogAnalyticsAppSecret.description: Client secret for the app registration with access to the log analytics workspace.
LogAnalyticsAppSecret.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsEndpointUrl.title: Log Analytics Endpoint Url
LogAnalyticsEndpointUrl.description: URL to the log analytics workspace.
LogAnalyticsEndpointUrl.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsSkipUnchanged.title: Log Analytics Skip Unchanged
LogAnalyticsSkipUnchanged.description: Option to only send changed data to log analytics.
LogAnalyticsSkipUnchanged.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsTenant.title: Log Analytics Tenant
LogAnalyticsTenant.description: The tenant in which log analytics is installed.
LogAnalyticsTenant.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsResourceId.title: Log Analytics Workspace Resource Id
LogAnalyticsResourceId.description: The log analytics workspace id used during Power BI report installation.
LogAnalyticsResourceId.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

SimeonSyncIntegrationAppId.title: Simeon Sync Integration App Id
SimeonSyncIntegrationAppId.description: App registration that can be used for all Integrations.
SimeonSyncIntegrationAppId.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

SimeonSyncIntegrationAppSecret.title: Simeon Sync Integration App Secret
SimeonSyncIntegrationAppSecret.description: Client secret for shared integration app registration.
SimeonSyncIntegrationAppSecret.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

SimeonSyncIntegrationTenant.title: Simeon Sync Integration Tenant
SimeonSyncIntegrationTenant.default: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide or complete these variables to install reporting.

SqlAzureAppId.title: Sql Azure App Id
SqlAzureAppId.description: App registration with access to the Azure SQL Server.

SqlAzureAppSecret.title: Sql Azure App Secret
SqlAzureAppSecret.description: Client secret for the app registration with access to to the Azure SQL Server.

SqlAzureServerName.title: Sql Azure Server Name
SqlAzureServerName.description: Name of the Azure SQL Server.

SqlAzureSkipUnchanged.title: Sql Azure Skip Unchanged
SqlAzureSkipUnchanged.description: Option to only send changed data to SQL Azure.

SqlAzureTenant.title: Sql Azure Tenant
SqlAzureTenant.description: The tenant in which the Azure SQL Server is installed.

ErrorNotificationEmailAddresses.title: Error Notification Email Addresses
ErrorNotificationEmailAddresses.description: The email addresses Sync error information will be sent to. These must be semicolon delimited with no spaces.

SummaryEmailExcludePipelines.title: Exclude Pipelines from Summary Email
SummaryEmailExcludePipelines.description: Pipelines that will be excluded from the summary email.

SummaryEmailExcludeRecipients.title: Exclude Users from Summary Email
SummaryEmailExcludeRecipients.description: Email addresses that will be excluded from the summary email. These must be semicolon delimited with no spaces.

SummaryEmailFromAddress.title: Summary Email from Address
SummaryEmailFromAddress.description: The email address from which the summary email is sent.

SummaryEmailToAddresses.title: Send Summary Email To Addresses
SummaryEmailToAddresses.description: The email addresses that the summary email will be sent to. These must be semicolon delimited with no spaces.

SmtpPort.title: Summary Email Smtp Port
SmtpPort.description: The SMTP port to send summary email, defaults to 587.

SmtpServer.title: Summary Email Smtp Server
SmtpServer.description: The Smtp server to send summary emails, defaults to smtp.office365.com.

SmtpUser.title: Summary Email Smtp User
SmtpUser.description: The user used to authenticate into the SMTP server to send the summary email.

SmtpUserPassword.title: Summary Email Smtp User Password
SmtpUserPassword.description: The user password used to authenticate into the SMTP server to send the summary email.

SummaryEmailBCCAddresseses.title: Summary Email To Bcc Address
SummaryEmailBCCAddresseses.description: The email addresses that the summary email will send to as BCC. These must be semicolon delimited with no spaces.

SummaryEmailCCAddresses.title: Summary Email To CC Address
SummaryEmailCCAddresses.description: The email addresses that the summary email will send to as CC. These must be semicolon delimited with no spaces.
